rooms.description: A welcoming entryway designed with Art Deco elements and wide door openings for wheelchair accessibility.

vastu.notes: The entrance is oriented north to encourage positive energy.

rooms.description: A spacious living room with Art Deco interior finishes, wide windows and accessible seating arrangements for wheelchair users.

vastu.notes: South facing ensures warmth and energy; furniture arranged to maintain open space.

rooms.description: An intimate dining area integrated with the living room, featuring wide passages for accessibility.

vastu.notes: East orientation for nourishment and balance.

rooms.description: A modern kitchen with open counters, wheelchair accessible layout and Art Deco style fixtures.

vastu.notes: West orientation supports creativity; designed for efficient workflow.

rooms.description: A generously sized bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, designed to be wheelchair accessible.

vastu.notes: North-east ensures mental clarity and well-being.

rooms.description: A comfortable guest room, easily accessible with a broad doorway.

vastu.notes: North-west position encourages balance and relaxation.

rooms.description: A cozy library designed for quiet reading, with wheelchair accessible shelving and seating.
Includes the utility space, storage and a small laundry area with accessible features.

openings.description: A wide main entrance door to facilitate easy access for wheelchair users, featuring Art Deco design elements.

details.description: Large windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation, designed with period features.
Functionally placed windows for light and accessibility.

openings.description: An accessible staircase design with handrails, though wheelchair users would use a lift if installed. Note: A future integration of a lift is recommended for full accessibility on upper floor.

accessibility_features: Lowered counters in the utility area.
